text: Chasing Papi is a 2003 American romantic comedy movie directed by Linda Mendoza and starring Roselyn Sánchez, Sofía Vergara, Jaci Velasquez, Eduardo Verástegui. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * Category:2003 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Chasing Papi
